title: Emerald Butterfly
description: Samantha Clearwater is just fitting into her new life in Del Mar, California. After the numerous times she's moved in the past, all she wants is a normal senior year until she meets Nathan West. Samantha can't help but fall for him the moment she lays her eyes on his. But Nathan isn't everything he seems. When unexplainable incidents creep into Samantha's life, Nathan admits the scary truth. Samantha is a part of something very powerful. And as she uncovers more to this unseen force, Samantha becomes aware of two opposing worlds behind the human realm: the Dark Red and the Light Blue. They each want her on their side and they'll do whatever it takes for her to join because Samantha is special. Now, through new love, discovery, and danger, she must fight to save herself and humanity.
author: A.P. Nuri
